values: When something is poor, it is not as good as it could or should be.
The condition of the sidewalk is very poor.
a.贫穷的
adj. 贫困的，贫穷的贫乏的低劣的；次等的(身体)衰弱的可怜的；不幸的比较级:poorer，poorest名 词:poorness
